remarks: Dataset contains workers' remittances statistics for 2023, showing remittances from Middle East and total remittances in both Sri Lankan Rupees (Million) and US Dollars (Million). Columns: Year, Remittances Middle East (Rs. Million), Remittances Middle East (US$ Million), Remittances Total (Rs. Million), Remittances Total (US$ Million), and Middle East as a % of total remittance. Data shows that in 2023, total remittances amounted to 1,950,777 million rupees (5,970 million USD), with Middle East remittances contributing 1,279,095 million rupees (3,916 million USD), representing 65.6% of total remittances. This highlights the significant contribution of Middle East employment to Sri Lanka's foreign exchange earnings.
